docs.snippet: A Russian presidential spokesman on Tuesday accused U.S. politicians of being paranoid after they blamed Russia for a hack of Democratic National Committee emails and said the country is backing Republican Donald Trump in the U.S. presidential rac...
docs.lead_paragraph: A Russian presidential spokesman on Tuesday accused U.S. politicians of being paranoid after they blamed Russia for a hack of Democratic National Committee emails and said the country is backing Republican Donald Trump in the U.S. presidential race.

docs.lead_paragraph: If the Russian government is behind the theft and release of embarrassing emails from the Democratic Party, as U.S. officials have suggested, it may reflect less a love of Donald Trump or enmity for Hillary Clinton than a desire to discredit the U.S. political system.
